## Equifax – Ignite Marketplace – Economic Indicators Subscription
### Invitation to Submit Statement of Capabilities
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) invites companies with an interest in providing Economic Indicators subscription services via Equifax’s Ignite Marketplace to submit a Statement of Capabilities. This notice is part of the Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) process, enabling other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding on the contract.

#### Background
OSFI requires a subscription to Equifax’s Economic Indicators service with user licenses. This ACAN aims to signal the government's intention to award a contract for these services to Equifax. However, before awarding a contract, the government would like to provide other suppliers with the opportunity to demonstrate that they are capable of satisfying the requirements listed below.

#### Requirements
 Suppliers must demonstrate the ability to:

* Provide immediate access to consumer credit risk reporting through an online user interface, covering a minimum of 5 years of information from 2023.
* Deliver historical (up to 25 years) consumer credit risk data, with OSFI owning the proprietary rights to the data once delivered.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The supplier's ability to meet the above requirements will be assessed. Demonstrated capabilities must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority on or before the closing date of March 16, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EDT).

#### Applicable Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization – Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA)

#### Additional Information
The estimated value of the contract, including option periods, is $455,349.00 CAD (HST extra, if applicable). The proposed contract duration is one (1) year, from March 31, 2023 to March 31, 2024, with option to extend up to two (2) additional 1-year periods.

#### Submission Guidelines
Please send inquiries and submissions to Craig Kenny, Senior Contracting Officer, at contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca. The closing date for submissions is March 16, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EDT). Supplier rights to submit a statement of capabilities are outlined in the attached document.
